thread.section_title: Reservation Counter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reservation Counter | reservationcounter.com
thread.title: Elyse Bennett
thread.title_full: Reservation Counter reviewed by Elyse Bennett

author: Elyse Bennett
title: Elyse Bennett
text: I have a conference code for a reduced rate and there was nowhere to enter it. I got an email about getting a 15% discount for returning and finishing my booking, but that didn't work. If it were not the official conference hotel I would not have booked.
